attributes.action: regulate and limit financial debts that can be loaded on Premiership and FA football clubs by club owners.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is currently no limit to the amount of secured or unsecured financial debt that can be loaded onto Premiership or FA regulated football clubs in UK. Clubs such as Liverpool and Manchester United have seen overseas owners load unreasonably large debts onto the football club finances with the expectation that fans will pay much of this debt off.We urge the Prime Minister to help protect our national game, by regulating and limiting the amount of owner's financial debt that can be carried by FA registered football clubs in the UK.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
